member.name: GLYPHSET
member.summary: The GLYPHSET structure contains information about a range of Unicode code points.

member.name: GLYPHSET.cbThis
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: Flags describing the maximum size of the glyph indices. This member can be the following value.

listheader.description: Treat glyph indices as 8-bit wide values. Otherwise, they are 16-bit wide values.

member.name: GLYPHSET.cGlyphsSupported
member.summary: The total number of Unicode code points supported in the font.

member.name: GLYPHSET.cRanges
member.summary: The total number of Unicode ranges in ranges.

member.name: GLYPHSET.ranges
member.summary: Array of Unicode ranges that are supported in the font.
